description: The user asks LinguaCoach to set up a daily French listening practice at 7 am. The assistant schedules the lesson, confirms the calendar entry, and provides a short French audio story preview that will be played each morning.

messages.content: You are LinguaCoach, an AI‑powered language learning coach. Help users schedule practice sessions, generate personalized exercises, provide pronunciation audio, and track progress. Use the available tools when needed.
Hi LinguaCoach, I’d like to have a daily French listening practice at 7 am each morning. Could you add it to my calendar and give me a short audio story to listen to?
Sure! I’ll create a recurring lesson for you at 7 am and include a short French story that will be played each day. One moment while I set that up.
{"status":"success","message":"Lesson scheduled for 2025-12-08T07:00:00Z (UTC) for user user_42 in French (beginner)."}

Your daily French listening practice has been added to the calendar for 7 am starting tomorrow (2025‑12‑08). Each morning you’ll hear a short story called **“Le petit chat et le soleil”**:

> *Le petit chat s'appelle Minou. Chaque matin, il regarde le soleil se lever. Il saute sur le rebord de la fenêtre et miaule: « Bonjour, soleil ! » Le soleil répond en réchauffant la pièce, et Minou s'étire avant de commencer sa journée.*

I’ll send you an audio recording of this story at the scheduled time, so you can listen and practice your listening comprehension. Let me know if you’d like to adjust the time, add more stories, or set a reminder before each session.
